name: At Eve's Wake
description:
At Eve's Wake is an interactive horror story inspired by Lovecraft's work about surviving a family you never knew and uncovering their sinister practices. Will you embrace them or rid humanity of their taint? Your actions will shape your fate and that of the family.


Raised by your mother, you’ve never known your family. Her sudden passing left you with many questions she never answered you: Why can’t I remember my family? Why did she split with the family? What happened to my father?

Until that letter arrived; your grandmother had passed away. Here you are now, letter in hand, before the gates of the family estate. At what should be just a funeral and nothing more.

Soon you realize why your mother left, as you are thrown into a gauntlet of fire — for a new successor must come. The time for Convergence has begun...



Personality
Are you smart, strong or charismatic? Those personality traits influence how you respond to situations, and how people will perceive you.
Each personality offers an unique play style, providing different dialog options and insights during your play through.

Might makes right
Aggressive and physical actions will prove more successful. Brute-force your way to success.

Wits is a dangerous weapon and you know to use it discreetly
Provides additional insight to situations and allows for easy escapes.

Charming is always getting a yes to a question you never had to ask
Persuasive actions will prove more successful and you sway situations in your favor.

Choices
While you may have forgotten, others will remember. Yet at the same time you will remember, with others forgetting.

Be mindful of the choices you make, for certain knowledge can never be forgotten.

Will you be their redemption or join their folds and lead?

Sanity
How you ultimately choose to shape your fate can affect your fragile state of mind.

Certain actions cause the human mind to go on a path spiraling down. Some slide down slowly without even knowing and and some do so fully aware tumbling face first down the steps.
